description: Creates the Empresa Nacional de Energía Eléctrica (ENEE)
Constructs the Puerto Cortés refinery owned by Texaco
Creates the Comisión Administradora de la Compra-Venta y Comercialización del Petróleo (CAP)
Hydrocarbon Law
Requires that tariffs receive congressional approval
Creates the Secretaría de Comunicaciones, Obras Públicas y Transporte (SECOPT)
Creates the Comisión Nacional Supervisora de los Servicios Públicos (CNSSP)
Liberalizes asphalt and fuel oil prices
Liberalizes gasoline prices
Texaco ends operations at the Puerto Cortez refinery
Liberalizes fuel oil prices
Electricity Subsector Law
Creates the Secretaría de Recursos Naturales y Ambiente (SERNA)
Eliminates the requirement that the CNEE get congressional approval for its annual operations plan
Decree to Promote Renewable Energy
Creates the Comisión Nacional de Energía (CNE)
Reforms the energy law

instrument: Executive Decree PCM-013-98 of 06/23/1998. O.G. 28644 of 08/19/1998
description: Creates the Unidad Técnica del Petróleo (UTP)
Regulates the price of energy established in the Power Purchase Agreements between the ENEE and private generation companies
State procurement law

instrument: Executive Decree PCM-026-2002 of 12/20/2002. O.G. of 12/23/2002
description: Emergency energy decree
Eliminates the UTP and restitutes the CAP
Promotes electricity generation with renewable resources
Special Regulatory Law of Public Renewable Energy Projects
